resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Appcelerator Documentation Site : Alloy.Controller - broken link identified within breadcrumbs

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h2. Problem
The link at the bottom of Layouts, Positioning, and the View Hierarchy results in 404 Page not found notice on the target site

h2. Test case
# Navigate to http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Layouts,_Positioning,_and_the_View_Hierarchy in a web browser.
# Scroll to the bottom of the page to the section titled "References and Further Reading"
# The 3rd link with the caption "Titanium app for explaining layout mechanisms" points to http://blog.krawaller.se/titanium-app-for-explaining-layout-mechanisms
# For clarity, the correct target for this link is: http://blog.krawaller.se/posts/titanium-app-for-explaining-layout-mechanisms/
fields.summary: Appcelerator Documentation Site : Titanium SDK - broken link identified within article

comments.body: Updated the link. It will be published to the docs by [~bimmel].
